actions.name: Cationic
actions.description: Effect: If there is at least one other allied creature with the Plus, Minus or Anionic Ability on the field, the user's DEF stat is increased by 50%. If the user is within 5m of an ally with the Plus, Minus, or Anionic Ability, they gain the effect of that Ability.
